title: Constraint-Led Training Design for Sports Skill Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sports science knowledge and fundamental exercise techniques
context.additional_context: Data-driven training design competency enhancement for corporate sports education program administrators.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods to derive constraints by analyzing core elements of motor skills.
Learners can design personalized training programs using machine learning-based data analysis.
Learners can develop at least three representative training scenarios reflecting real-game environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
